html:
2025-0533
2025-06-26FINCustoms TariffOrder Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024) and the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025)Order Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024) in order to (1) in order to change three products from product-specific to company-specific relief, as a domestic source of supply has been identified for these products; (2) to provide company-specific relief for one additional company following assessment of its application for remission and to correct an administrative error in one of the tariff items in Schedule, and (3) Order amending the United States Surtax Remission Order will be amend to extend remission surtaxes paid or payable on imports of certain goods from the United States, and amends Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Order.Registration: SOR/2025-0147 Publication Date: 2025-07-16
subject: Order Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024) and the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025)
precis: Order Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024) in order to (1) in order to change three products from product-specific to company-specific relief, as a domestic source of supply has been identified for these products; (2) to provide company-specific relief for one additional company following assessment of its application for remission and to correct an administrative error in one of the tariff items in Schedule, and (3) Order amending the United States Surtax Remission Order will be amend to extend remission surtaxes paid or payable on imports of certain goods from the United States, and amends Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Order.
